name: Mentions in slash command payload
precondition: Demo plugin with `/show_mentions` - latest version of demo plugin should work

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Install the latest demo plugin with `/show_mentions` slash command implemented.
  2. Enable the plugin.
  3. In a channel, @-mention a user (e.g. `@user-1`).
  4. In a channel, do channel mention (e.g.`~town-square`).
  5. In a post input box in center channel, issue the slash command like `/show_mentions @user-1 ~town-square`.
  6. Verify that an output with the user name and channel is displayed in the center channel by the demo-plugin bot.
